snippet.title: V Rising - Official Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the cinematic release date trailer for V Rising, the survival action-RPG that's been in Early Access since 2022. It's ready to go 1.0, and that will happen on PC on May 8 and on PS5 later in 2024.

#IGN
